intro_p1: The questionnaire in front of you is a research and diagnostic tool developed by Dr. Mati Har-Lev.
intro_p2: Its purpose is to assess your level of Conscious - Mind Leadership.
intro_p3: This questionnaire has no right or wrong answers. For each statement indicate to what extent this statement describes you.
intro_p4: Once you have completed the questionnaire, we will send you an email containing an analysis of your current state of consciousness.
intro_goodLuck: Good luck, and thank you for your participation!
intro_p6: Creator of the Conscious-Mind Leadership method.,
contact_form_almostDone: Thank you for completing the questionnaire! We greatly appreciate your participation. If you have any further questions or need additional information, please don't hesitate to reach out.
contact_form_acceptance: By submitting this form, you are giving consent to receive an email containing an analysis based on your responses.
thank_you_span1: Thank you for answering the questions
thank_you_span2: An email has been sent to the email provided. If by any chance you do not see the mail, please check your spam/ promotion.
